actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a portion of the Tongue River, Wyo., for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, a specified portion of the Tongue River, Wyoming, for potential inclusion in the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Directs tha tthe study required under such Act be completed within two years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating a portion of the Tongue River, Wyo., for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
